023
024package org.opt4j.core.optimizer;
025
026import org.opt4j.core.Individual;
027import org.opt4j.core.common.completer.SequentialIndividualCompleter;
028import org.opt4j.core.problem.Decoder;
029import org.opt4j.core.problem.Evaluator;
030
031import com.google.inject.ImplementedBy;
032
033/**
034 * An {@link IndividualCompleter} completes the evaluation process of
035 * {@link Individual}s. In particular, the individuals are decoded using a
036 * {@link Decoder} and evaluated using an {@link Evaluator}.
037 * 
038 * @author lukasiewycz
039 * 
040 */
041@ImplementedBy(SequentialIndividualCompleter.class)
042public interface IndividualCompleter {
043
044        /**
045         * Decodes and evaluates all {@link Individual}s in the {@link Iterable} if
046         * they are not already evaluated.
047         * 
048         * @param iterable
049         *            the set of individuals to be completed
050         * @throws TerminationException
051         *             if the optimization is terminated
052         */
053        public void complete(Iterable<? extends Individual> iterable) throws TerminationException;
054
055        /**
056         * Decodes and evaluates all given {@link Individual}s if they are not
057         * already evaluated.
058         * 
059         * @param individuals
060         *            the individuals to be completed
061         * @throws TerminationException
062         *             if the optimization is terminated
063         */
064        public void complete(Individual... individuals) throws TerminationException;
065}
